comments:
Build 20020312

ConcurrentModificationException when switching to source in plugin.xml editor

I did the following - but doing it a second time it worked:
1. Opened plugin.xml for JDT
2. Selected javaElementFilters extension-point
3. Selected ~team.cvs.ui plug-in
4. Selected the javeElementFilters extension
4. Double-clicked on "filter"
5. Selected source tab
